name: Death Cross
description:
Death Cross is an arena game where you play as an avenging angel with 2 shotguns. It has a funky 8-color 80's palette with neon colors.

Features:

- A tutorial room to learn the basics of combat

- Two satisfying shotguns that can be fired separately from each other

- Strange enemies with cool attacks

- Tougher enemies appear as the difficulty ramps up

- A nice 8-color palette consistent throughout the entire game

- Limited ammo pack pickups for use when in tight spaces

- Ammo that regenerates over time

- Health that regenerates slowly over time

Thank you for reading :) comment down below any feedback or questions you have, as I'd really appreciate it, and make sure to rate my submission as well. Have a nice day :).
